full_description:
ZOOOK Crescendo Bluetooth Neckband Stereo Earphones with Mic

The ZOOOK Crescendo Bluetooth Neckband delivers clear audio for music and phone conversations. It has a Bluetooth chipset that offers Hi-Fi and rich sound for music, as well as outstanding speech clarity. When not in use, discreet magnets keep earbuds together, ensuring they're easily accessible while cords stay tangle-free and out of the way. You can effortlessly accept calls and regulate your music while on the go thanks to the built-in mic and button control. The ZOOOK Crescendo is a lightweight, secure fit, and lightweight at only 28g with a Flex-Form fitting neckband - set and forget you're wearing them. Enjoy TV with crescendo When viewing TV or movies, it almost eliminates audio delay. This is IPX5 Sweat-Proof. Stay safe from splashing water and perspiration. Whether you're caught in the rain or sweating it out at the gym, your headphones will be protected from splashing water and perspiration damage. The ZOOOK Crescendo Bluetooth Neckband has a 06-months warranty.

values.value: Supported Profiles: HSP, HFP, A2DP, AVRCP, CVC

full_description:
ZOOOK ZM-ONE EAR Single Stereo Earbud Headphone with Mic

The ZOOOK BluePods Wireless Neckband Earphone has a high-quality stereo sound and an in-built microphone. These earbuds are broadly compatible with most phones, including the iPhone and Android, as well as laptops and a variety of other Bluetooth devices. The BluePods have an accommodating angle that fits your ear canal better and reduces noise. A strong lithium battery included within the device provides up to 8 hours of talk/music time (depending on volume and audio content) for extended pleasure. Enjoy hand calls with the case's built-in microphone and manage your music with the remote control of the blue pod. The ZOOOK BluePods Wireless Neckband Earphone comes with a 06-months warranty.
